description: Gets configuration information for the specified adapter version, including: AdapterId, AdapterVersion, FeatureTypes, Status, StatusMessage, DatasetConfig, KMSKeyId, OutputConfig, Tags and EvaluationMetrics.

parameters.name: AdapterId
parameters.description: A string specifying a unique ID for the adapter version you want to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: AdapterVersion
parameters.description: A string specifying the adapter version you want to retrieve information for.

nested_items.name: AdapterId
nested_items.description: A string containing a unique ID for the adapter version being retrieved.

nested_items.name: AdapterVersion
nested_items.description: A string containing the adapter version that has been retrieved.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the adapter version was created.

nested_items.name: FeatureTypes
nested_items.description: List of the targeted feature types for the requested adapter version.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the adapter version that has been requested.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message that describes the status of the requested adapter version.

nested_items.name: DatasetConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies a dataset used to train a new adapter version. Takes a ManifestS3Objec as the value.

nested_items.name: ManifestS3Object
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket name and file name that identifies the document.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket. Note that the # character is not valid in the file name.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The file name of the input document. Image files may be in PDF, TIFF, JPEG, or PNG format.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: If the bucket has versioning enabled, you can specify the object version.

nested_items.name: KMSKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier for your AWS Key Management Service key (AWS KMS key). Used to encrypt your documents.

nested_items.name: OutputConfig
nested_items.description: Sets whether or not your output will go to a user created bucket. Used to set the name of the bucket, and the prefix on the output file.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the bucket your output will go to.

nested_items.name: S3Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix of the object key that the output will be saved to. When not enabled, the prefix will be 'textract_output'.

nested_items.name: EvaluationMetrics
nested_items.description: The evaluation metrics (F1 score, Precision, and Recall) for the requested version, grouped by baseline metrics and adapter version.

nested_items.name: F1Score
nested_items.description: The F1 score for an adapter version.

nested_items.name: Precision
nested_items.description: The Precision score for an adapter version.

nested_items.name: Recall
nested_items.description: The Recall score for an adapter version.

nested_items.name: AdapterVersion
nested_items.description: The F1 score, precision, and recall metrics for the baseline model.

nested_items.name: F1Score
nested_items.description: The F1 score for an adapter version.

nested_items.name: Precision
nested_items.description: The Precision score for an adapter version.

nested_items.name: Recall
nested_items.description: The Recall score for an adapter version.

nested_items.name: FeatureType
nested_items.description: Indicates the feature type being analyzed by a given adapter version.
(string) ---
(string) ---
